  • Uses of ServletContextListener in cloud.piranha.cdi.weld

    Classes in cloud.piranha.cdi.weld that implement ServletContextListener 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  WeldInitListener
    This Piranha specific Weld initializer forwards all initialization to the original Weld initializer, but modifies the HttpServletRequest that's passed into it.

  • Uses of ServletContextListener in cloud.piranha.webapp.impl

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.List<ServletContextListener> DefaultWebApplication.contextListeners
    Stores the servlet context listeners that were not declared in web.xml, web-fragment.xml, or via annotations
    protected java.util.List<ServletContextListener> DefaultWebApplication.declaredContextListeners
    Stores the servlet context listeners that were declared in web.xml, web-fragment.xml, or via annotations
